# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and performance. This item is truly a testament to quality and innovation, making it an indispensable addition to your collection or needs. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $180. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to serving you with this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
